recipesJson.name: God's Milk
recipesJson.author: EdibleMalfunction
recipesJson.description: Strawberries and Cream may be way overdone, but I think this stands out enough to share it with everyone. Delicious strawberry milk taste with hazelnut and sugar cookie thrown in there for body

reviews.text: Delicious Strawberry Cream recipe - nice ADV style recipe. Great body and mouthfeel in - enjoy the combo of strawberries in the mix. Wonder how this would work with INW Shisha Strawberry + JF Strawberry Sweet? Might give that a go soon - love the cream base!

After a 1 week steep, I am finding this to be a very tasty mix. The cream is prominent without being over heavy, with the main body of the mix coming from the cookie/nut. I do like the strawberry, however I prefer a more candied strawberry flavour, so I will swap the ratios of the strawberries around.  Thank you!
